name: MAGICAL PONG ! THE PONG 2020
description:
Magical Pong was produced for the GAMECODEUR Game Jam 28 by SEBMUSEUM.  in LUA / LOVE2D. This game is played with two players.

HOW TO PLAY :

Player 1 : A key for UP & Q key for down

Player 2 : Use Up and Down arrows keys

and that's all !!! enjoy !
